IRS990.Desc: KNOXVILLE OPERA IS ENGAGED IN THE PERFORMANCE OF OPERA AND MUSICAL PRODUCTIONS IN THE EAST TENNESSEE AREA. EXPENSES WERE INCURRED RELATING TO FIVE PERFORMANCES OF THREE MAJOR PRODUCTIONS AND 100+ EDUCATIONAL OUTREACH EVENTS WHICH WERE COMPLETED IN THE YEAR ENDED JUNE 30, 2022.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE BYLAW WAS CHANGED TO CORRECT FISCAL YEAR, REVISED NUMBER OF BOARD MEMBERS AND OTHER ISSUES AS ATTACHMENT.
MEMBERS ARE DONORS(ANYONE WHO HAS CONTRIBUTED TO THE ORGANIZATION)
THE 990 IS REVIEWED BY THE CHIEF EXECUTIVE OFFICER.
DOCUMENTS ARE AVAILABLE UPON REQUEST BY THE PUBLIC.
